mapper.select: /* 댓글 목록 조회 */ SELECT T1.replyNo , T1.boardNo , T1.content , T1.writer , T1.delYn , T1.createDate , T1.updateDate FROM (SELECT REPLY_NO AS replyNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , CONTENT AS content , WRITER AS writer , DEL_YN AS delYn , CREATE_DATE AS createDate , UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM REPLY WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} )T1 WHERE 1=1
